subject: Re: Mel-8704 (emf)
author: ourobouros2k2
full_text:
I too have been wondering how this meter stacks up. It sure is the hot 
topic in most paranormal circles, and although I have been a wait-and-
see (more like save-and-wait) guy, I am pretty curious about this one.

thanks
Andy
